source: Abanoonyiboobubudamu bonna baasabiddwa beewandiise ewa ssentebe.
reference: All refugees were requested to register with the chairman.

source: Baayise olukungaana lw'abanoonyiboobubudamu eggulo.
reference: They called for a refugees' meeting yesterday.

source: Abanoonyiboobubudamu b'abadde n'obutakkaanya wakati waabwe.
reference: Refugees had misunderstandings between   themselves.

source: Twakubirizibwa okwaniriza abanoonyiboobubudamu mu bitundu byaffe.
reference: We were urged to welcome refugees into our communities.

source: Bwe tukolera awamu enkulaakulana enyingi efunibwa.
reference: More development is achieved when we work together.

source: Disitulikiti eziriraanye ensalo si ntebenkevu.
reference: The border districts are insecure.

source: Abanoonyiboobubudamu batandise okulima okusobola okwebeezaawo.
reference: Refugees have started practicing farming so as to earn a living.

source: Kimenya mateeka okubeera n'emmundu.
reference: It is illegal to own a gun.

source: Awa nnyo bazadde be kitiibwa.
reference: He is very disrespectful to his parents.

source: Omusajja anywa nnyo omwenge.
reference: He takes a lot of alcohol.

source: Twasomeseddwa ku kwerwanako.
reference: We were educated about self-defense.

source: Abantu bangi abaakubiddwa amasasi ne bafa.
reference: Many people were shot dead.

source: Abantu bangi abafiirwa obulamu bwabwe mu lutalo.
reference: Many people lost their lives during the war.

source: Abasajja bateekeddwa okutandika ebibiina ebitereka ensimbi.
reference: Men should start up savings groups.

source: Ekibiina ekiterekebwamu ensimbi kibeeramu abantu ab'obuwangwa obw'enjawulo.
reference: The savings group is composed of people of different cultures.

source: Yakooneddwa loole.
reference: He was knocked down by a lorry.

source: Omuvuzi wa loole yakwatiddwa.
reference: The lorry driver was arrested.

source: Omulambo gwe gwatwaliddwa okwekebejebwa.
reference: His body has been taken for postmortem.

source: Abanoonyiboobubudamu baagambiddwa okubeera mu bifo bimu.
reference: Refugees were told to settle in specific areas.

source: Yafiiridde ku myaka mito nnyo.
reference: He died at a very young age.

source: Bamulekwa banyoleddwa nnyo.
reference: The orphans are very depressed.

source: Okugulu kwe kwamenyekedde mu kabenje k'emmotoka.
reference: Her leg was broken during the car accident.

source: Omukulu w'essomero yatugambye tubeere begendereza nga twewandiisa okukola ebibuuzo.
reference: The headteacher told us to be careful while registering for exams.

source: Abavuzi b'ebidduka bakubiriziddwa okwewala okuvuga endiima.
reference: Drivers are advised to avoid over speeding.

source: Yabadde avuga ng'anywedde.
reference: He was driving while drunk.

source: Loole yeetaaga okuddaabiriza.
reference: The lorry needs to be serviced.

source: Tetulina kwogerera ku ssimu nga tuvuga.
reference: We should not talk on the phone while driving.

source: Poliisi ekyanoonyereza ekyaviiriddeko omuliro.
reference: Police is still investigating about the cause of the fire.

source: Poliisi yalemereddwa okuzuula ekyaviiriddeko akabenje.
reference: Police failed to find out the cause of the accident.

source: Abantu bangi abaafiiridde mu kabenje.
reference: Many people died in the accident.

source: Essomero lyawadde abaana abamu bbasale.
reference: The school gave out bursaries to some students.

source: Abanoonyiboobubudamu nabo baayingiridde ku bbasale.
reference: Refugees were also admitted on bursaries.

source: Waliwo omusomo gw'abasomesa ogugenda mu maaso.
reference: There is an ongoing teachers' workshop.

source: Abasinga okukola obulungi bokka beebaaweereddwa sikaala.
reference: Only the best performers were given scholarships.

source: Amasomero amalala gateekeddwa okuzimbibwa mu bukiikakkono bwa Uganda.
reference: More schools should be built in Northern Uganda.

source: Waliwo olukiiko lw'abakozi abatali basomesa.
reference: There is a meeting for the non-teaching staff.

source: Abayizi bateekeddwa okubeera n'empisa..
reference: Students should always be disciplined.

source: Omukulu w'essomero yagamba abayizi okukola ennyo.
reference: The headteacher told the students to work hard.

source: Abazadde baasabiddwa okusasula ebisale by'essomero mu budde.
reference: Parents were requested to pay school fees in time.

source: Abayizi abasinga okukola obulungi bajja kusiimibwa.
reference: The best performing students will be rewarded.

source: Yanjozaayoza olw'okuwangula sikaala.
reference: He congratulated me upon winning the scholarship.

source: Abayizi bajja kubuulirirwa nga tebannatuula bibuuzo byabwe.
reference: Students will have a briefing before they sit their exams.

source: Gavumenti yasasulidde abayizi abamu okusomera ebweru.
reference: The government sponsored some students to study from abroad.

source: Abalimi n'abalunzi baweereddwa entandikwa endala.
reference: Farmers have been given more capital.

source: Abantu abasinga bayimirirawo ku bulimi n'obulunzi okubeerawo.
reference: Most people rely on farming for survival.

source: Baabadde tebasuubira kisulo kipya kukwata muliro.
reference: They did not expect the new dormitory to catch fire.

source: Abalimi baatendekeddwa ku nnima ez'omulembe.
reference: Farmers were trained about the best farming practices.

source: Abanoonyiboobubudamu baaweereddwa obuyambi bw'emmere.
reference: Refugees were given food relief.

source: Ebiseera bya nkuba.
reference: It is a rainny season.

source: Twawandiikidde gavumenti nga tusaba buyambi.
reference: We wrote to the government seeking funding.

source: Twaweereddwa amagezi okukozesa engeri empya ez'amasannyalaze.
reference: We were advised to use renewable energy sources.

source: Abantu bangi balwadde omwezi guno.
reference: Many people have fallen sick this month.

source: Abanoonyiboobubudamu abamu tebasobola kugenda ku musomo.
reference: Some refugees cannot attend the workshop.

source: Abanoonyiboobubudamu baakubiriziddwa okukola ennyo okwekulaakulanya.
reference: Refugees were urged to work hard to develop themselves.

source: Abanoonyiboobubudamu abasinga balima ebirime ebitundibwa.
reference: Many refugees grow cash crops.

source: Bbaasi eteekeddwa okukanikibwa.
reference: The bus should be repaired.

source: Ekitundu kyaguze bbaasi empya.
reference: The community bought a new bus.

source: Tukyasonda kugula mmotoka .
reference: We are still fundraising to buy a car .

source: Abayizi baasabye essomero okugula bbaasi.
reference: Students requested the school to purchase a bus.

source: Abayizi abamu tebasobola bisale bya ntambula buli lunaku kugenda ku ssomero.
reference: Some students cannot afford daily transport to school.

source: Baasonze ne bagula bbaasi y'essomero.
reference: They fundraised and bought a school bus.

source: Abanoonyiboobubudamu abalala basenze mu kitundu eky'omu masekkati.
reference: More refugees have settled in the central region.

source: Bbaasi y'essomero ya mugaso nnyo.
reference: The school bus is very useful.

source: Yawadde obujulizi mu kaseera k'okusaba mu kkanisa.
reference: She testified during the church service.

source: Sitambulangako ku lugendo luwanvu.
reference: I have never traveled a long distance.

source: Saasondera mukolo guno.
reference: I did not contribute to this event.

source: Yasiimye abakulembeze olw'omulimu omulungi.
reference: He was very grateful to the leaders for the good work.

source: Tetunnalonda bakulembeze bapya.
reference: We have not yet elected the new leaders.

source: Ffenna yatusabye tumusondere ku ssente.
reference: He requested all of us to make financial contributions.

source: Ekisaawe ky'ebyenjigiriza kya nkizo nnyo.
reference: The education sector is a very sensitive sector.

source: Waliwo emisango gy'ettaka mingi.
reference: There are many land wrangle cases.

source: Abaana bateekeddwa okutendekebwa obutalwana.
reference: Children should be trained not to fight.

source: Abantu bangi abaafiiridde mu bwegugungo obwakayita.
reference: Many people died during the recent demonstrations.

source: Abaana bangi batulugunyizibwa bazadde babwe.
reference: Many children are mistreated by their parents.

source: Waabaddewo olutuula lwa kkooti okugonjoola enkaayana z'ettaka.
reference: There was a court session to settle the land disputes.

source: Mutabani wange ajja kusikira ettaka lyange.
reference: My son will inherit my land.

source: Omusumba yagaanye abavubuka okukozesa ebiragalalagala
reference: The priest discouraged youth from using drugs

source: Ettaka lye lyabbibwa omwami eyawasamaama we.
reference: His land was grabbed by his step father.

source: Ffenna twasabibwa okuwandiisa ettaka lyaffe.
reference: We were all requested to register our land.

source: Tebannagonjoola nkaayana za ttaka.
reference: They have not yet resolved the land disputes.

source: Ssentebe yatusabye tusisinkane tugonjoole ensonga.
reference: The chairman requested us to meet and resolve the issues.

source: Yatiddwa mutabani we.
reference: He was killed by his son.

source: Abantu beetaaga okusomesebwa ku bwannannyini bw'ettaka.
reference: People need to be sensitized about land ownership.

source: Amasomero gasabye gavumenti okubawa obuyambi bw'emmere.
reference: Schools have asked the government to give them food relief.

source: Okutambuza abayizi kwanguyiziddwa.
reference: Transportation of students has been eased.

source: Buli muyizi yasonze eri okuzimbibwa kw'ekibiina ekipya.
reference: Every student contributed towards construction of the new classroom block.

source: Bbaasa yasomye embalirira y'essomero.
reference: The bursar read out the school budget.

source: Abaganyulwa mu pulojekiti okusinga bayizi.
reference: The beneficiaries of the project are mainly students.

source: Twakubirizibwa okukozesa mu bujjuvu ebintu byonna ebiriwo nga tuli ku ssomero.
reference: We were advised to fully exploit the available resources while in school.

source: Abazadde abasinga obungi baagaanye okusonda ssente z'okugula bbaasi y'essomero.
reference: Majority of the parents refused to contribute towards the purchase of the school bus.

source: Essomero libanjibwa nnyo
reference: The school is greatly indebted.

source: Abakulembeze baayiibwa nnyo bazadde.
reference: The administrators were very disappointed with the parents.

source: Minisita yawaddeyo ssente mu kuzimba ekizimbe ekipya.
reference: The minister contributed towards the construction of the new building.

source: Bbaasi y'essomero tesobola kumalawo bayizi bonna.
reference: The school bus cannot accommodate most of the students.

source: Abayizi beemulugunyizza ku ndya embi.
reference: Students complained about the poor feeding.

source: Ssentebe yatusabye ffenna okukolerera enkulaakulana.
reference: The chairman requested all of us to work towards development     .

source: Minisita yawaddeyo n'omutima gumu.
reference: The minister contributed generously.

source: Abavubuka bangi tebalina mirimu.
reference: Most youth are unemployed.

source: Abavubuka baakubiriziddwa okutondawo emirimu oba bizinensi ezaabwe.
reference: Youth were encouraged to create their own jobs or businesses.

source: Tukyetaaga ensimbi endala okumaliriza pulojekiti.
reference: We still need more funds to complete the project.

source: Ebibiina by'abavubuka eby'enjawulo byafuna ensimbi mu ngeri ya looni wansi wa pulogulaamu y'abavubuka.
reference: Various youth groups received funds in the form of loans under the youth program.

source: Gavumenti esonyiye amabanja ga looni mangi agali mu pulogulaamu y'abavubuka eya youth liverihood program.
reference: The government has written off millions of money under the youth livelihood program loans.

source: Kirungi okubeera toddiriza mu bizinensi yo.
reference: It is good to be consistent in your business.

source: Yasomesezza abavubuka ku bukodyo bw'okukwatamu obulungi ensimbi.
reference: He educated the youth about better financial management skills.

source: Enteekateeka egendereddwamu kwongera ku mirimu na kukendeeza bwavu.
reference: The program is aimed at increasing employment rate and to reduce poverty.

source: Muganda wange yekweka oluvannyuma lw'okufuna akakadde k'ensimbi ku banjja okuva mu bbanka.
reference: My brother hid after receiving a one million Uganda shilling loan from the bank.

source: Obuwanguzi bujja n'okulemererwa kungi.
reference: Success comes with a lot of failures.

source: Kino ekirowoozo kya bizinesi kirungi?
reference: Is this a good business idea?

source: Waliwo okweyongera kw'ebbula ly'emirimu mu bavubuka ennaku zino.
reference: There is an increase in youth unemployment these days.

source: Ekiruubirirwa ky'enteekateeka kyali ky'abaavu n'abavubuka batalina mirimu.
reference: The program reference was for the poor and unemployed youth.

source: Waliwo ebitongole eby'enjawulo ebikola okumalawo enguzi mu Uganda.
reference: There are various institutions working against corruption in Uganda.

source: Waliwo obuli bw'enguzi n'obulyake bingi mu bitongole bya gavumenti.
reference: There is corruption and nepotism in many government departments.

source: Omukolo gw'okulayira gwakukolebwa enkya kumakya ku kitebe kya disitulikiti.
reference: The swearing in ceremony will be held tomorrow in the morning at the district headquarters.

source: Omukulembeze alina okulaga obwenkanya wakati w'abaami b'abakyala.
reference: The leader should lead out true equality between  men and women.

source: Tosobola ku kulembera nga tolina bagoberezi.
reference: You can't lead without followers.

source: Wajja kubeerawo olukiiko lw'ekitundu n'abakulembeze b'ekitundu.
reference: There will be a community meeting with the community leaders.

source: Twalonze abakulembeze b'ekyalo kyaffe ku lwokusatu n'ebibasuubirwamu bingi.
reference: We elected our village leaders on Wednesday, with a lot of expectations.

source: Buli mugenyi wa kuwandiika ng'ayingira n'okufuluma ekizimbe.
reference: Every visitor is to sign in and out of the building.

source: Buli kyalo kiddukanyizibwa omukulembeze.
reference: Each village is run by a local leader.

source: Ssentebe wa L.C eyookutaano y'akulembera olukiiko.
reference: The chairman local council five heads the meeting.

source: Poliisi egezezzaako engeri empya ez'okuyimiriza obuzzi bw'emisango.
reference: The police have tried new methods to stop crime rate.

source: Twafunye okutendekebwa okuva eri abakugu abamanyirivu ab'amakolero.
reference: We received training from the experienced industry professionals.

source: Olukiiko lujja kubeerayo wiiki ejja ku lwokutaano mu kisenge ky'ekibuga.
reference: The meeting will be held next week on Friday at the town hall.

source: Okuvuga gw'egumu ku mirimu egy'obulabe mu kisaawe ky'amafuta.
reference: Driving is one of the most dangerous jobs in the oil field.

source: Baazuula amafuta ne gaasi mu kitundu ky'obukiikakkono bw'eggwanga.
reference: They discovered oil and gas in the Northern part of the country.

source: Amafuta ne gaasi gali mu mbeera ki mu Uganda?
reference: What is the state of oil and gas in Uganda?

source: Obwerufu kikulu mu kukomya enguzi mu nsi engagga.
reference: Transparency is important to stop corruption in resource rich countries.

source: Mu Uganda amafuta gaazulibwa emyaka kkumi egiyise.
reference: In Uganda, oil was discovered ten years ago.

source: Okwonoona amafuta kyabulabe eri ebisolo n'ebiwuka.
reference: Oil pollution harms animals and insects.

source: Omusolo gujja kusoloozebwa, gulangirirwe ate gubalirirwe.
reference: The revenue will be collected, reported and accounted for.

source: Ebyalo ebiri mu bitundu omuli amafuta bijja kuganyulwa okuva mu kusima amafuta ne gaasi.
reference: The local community in oil rich regions will benefit from oil and gas exploitation.

source: Gavumenti ejja kufuna ssente nnyingi okuva mu kisaawe ky'amafuta ne gaasi.
reference: The government will get a lot of income from the oil and gas industry.

source: Minisita yakubirizza bannansi okukozesa emikisa gyonna mu kitongole ky'amafuta be ggaasi.
reference: The minister urged the locals to exploit opportunities in the oil and gas industry.

source: Naffe tukosebwa olw'obutaba n'amasannyalaze mu bitundu byaffe.
reference: We are also affected by lack of power in our areas.

source: Omulimu ogw'okwongeza layini y'amasannyalaze mu bukiikakkono bwa Uganda gutandise.
reference: The power line extension to the Northern part of Uganda has begun.

source: Abatuuze baali baggwamu essuubi ly'okufuna amasannyalaze mu bitundu byabwe.
reference: The locals had lost hope of getting electricity in their areas.

source: Bannannyini ttaka waya z'amasannyalaze wezinaayita baaliyirirwa.
reference: Owners of the land where the power lines will pass were compensated.

source: Abatuuze mu kitundu bamativu n'okuliririrwa kwe baafunye.
reference: The people in the community are satisfied with the compensation they got.

source: Yakubirizza abatuuze okukozesa ssente okwekulaakulanya mu maka gaabwe.
reference: He advised the locals to use the money for developing their livelihoods.

source: Abantu abamu baafunye ssente ntono okusinziira ku kwonoonebwa kwe baafuna.
reference: Some people received less money compared to the destruction they got.

source: Abantu abasinga mu bitundu bino bakoseddwa obwavu.
reference: Most of the people in these areas are affected by poverty.

source: Pulezidenti yalagidde abalunzi okuva mu kitundu ekyo.
reference: The president directed the pastoralists to leave that region.

source: Abalunzi bano babba ente z'abatuuze.
reference: These pastoralists steal the residents' cattle.

source: Abamu ku balunzi tebalina ppamiti kutambuza nte.
reference: Some of the pastoralists don't have permits to move cattle.

source: Abatuuze baawaddeyo okwemulugunya kwaabwe mu lukiiko lw'ekyalo eri abakulembeze baabwe.
reference: The residents raised their complaints in the village meeting with their leaders.

source: Mu bitundu ebimu, obulunzi bw'ente mulimu nnyo mu bavubuka.
reference: In some regions pastoralism is a common activity among the youth.

source: Abalunzi abaabadde bakwatiddwa baawadde abakungu ba Poliisi enguzi okubayimbula.
reference: The pastoralists who had been arrested bribed the police officers to release them.

source: Abatuuze balina eddembe ku ttaka lyabwe.
reference: Residents have a right to their land.

source: Abakulembeze abamu bayambako abalunzi mu kutambuza ente okumenya amateeka.
reference: Some leaders help the pastoralists in the illegal movement of cattle.

source: Akakiiko kaatadde envumbo ku kutambuza ebisolo ekiro.
reference: The committee imposed a ban on livestock movement in the night.

source: Waliwo ebibinja by'abalunzi  eby'enjawulo mu Uganda.
reference: There are different pastoral groups in Uganda.

source: Kirungi okukuuma emirembe n'obutebenkevu mu kitundu.
reference: It is important to keep peace and security in the community.

source: twetaaga obuwagizi obulala okulwanyisa okwonoona obutonde.
reference: We need more support to fight environmental degradation.

source: Abanoonyiboobubudamu bakosa nnyo obutonde bw'ensi.
reference: Refugees are causing a wide environmental damage.

source: Pulojekiti ziyamba mu kusimba emiti mu bukiikakkono bwa Uganda.
reference: Projects are helping with the planting of trees in the Northern part of Uganda.

source: Abanoonyiboobubudamu batema emiti okufunamu embaawo n'amanda eby'okutunda.
reference: Refugees cut down trees for timber and charcoal trade.

source: Waliwo okweyongera mu kutema emiti mu Uganda.
reference: There is an increase in the cutting down of trees in Uganda.

source: Ebitongole ebikuumaddembe mu disitulikiti birwanyisa okutema emiti mu bitundu ebyo.
reference: Security forces in the district are fighting the cutting down of trees in those areas.

source: Abatuuze mu kitundu nabo beenyigira mu kutunda amanda.
reference: The residents in the community also take part in the charcoal trade.

source: Gavumenti ettaddewo amateeka amakakali agakugira okutema emiti.
reference: The government has put up strict rules to prohibit cutting down of trees.

source: Abakulembeze b'ebyalo bakubirizza abatuuze okukuuma obutonde.
reference: Local leaders have urged the community to conserve the environment.

source: Tufuna ebibala okuva ku bika by'emiti ebimu.
reference: We get fruits from some species of trees.

source: Waliwo okweyongera mu muwendo gw'abanoonyiboobubudamu abajja mu Uganda.
reference: There is an increase in the number of refugees coming into Uganda.

source: Gavumenti yayongedde ku mutemwa oguweebwa ebyobulamu.
reference: The government increased the funds allocated to the health sector.

source: Pulezidenti ye yali omugenyi omukulu mu kuggulawo essomero ly'abazaalisa.
reference: The president was the guest of honor at the opening of the midwifery school.

source: Abayizi baweebwa amagezi okutwala amasomo ga ssaayansi.
reference: Students are advised to take on science subjects.

source: Omukulembeze w'abakyala yazimbye essomero ly'abazaalisa.
reference: The woman leader established the midwifery school.

source: Kya mugaso omusawo okussaawo enkolagana n'abalwadde be.
reference: It is important for a doctor to develop a connection to his patients.

source: Ekitundu kisanyufu olw'okumalirizibwa kw'essomero ly'abazaalisa.
reference: The community is happy for completion of the midwifery school.

source: Gavumenti esaanye ekendeeze ku muwendo gw'abakiise mu paalamenti eyongeze emisaala gyabwe.
reference: The government should reduce the number of members of parliament and increase their salaries.

source: Pulezidenti yagaanye okwongezebwa kw'emisaala gy'abakozi ba gavumenti abamu.
reference: The president refused the increase in salary of some government officials.

source: Nnawa abayizi bange ekigezo ku lwokutaano.
reference: I gave my learners an exam of Friday

source: Eggwanga lyaffe lyafunye okukendeera mu baana abafa nga bato n'abakyala abafiira mu ssanya.
reference: Our country registered a decline in infant and maternal rates.

source: Gavumenti ewadde abaana abasinga okusoma obulungi okusomera obwereere.
reference: The government has given bursaries to the best performing students.

source: Ekibiina ky'ebyobufuzi kiruubirira kutumbula mirimu mu bavubuka.
reference: The political party is focusing on improving employment opportunities among the youth.

source: Omukulembeze w'ekyalo yawaddeyo ettaka kuzimbibweko essomero.
reference: The village leader offered land for the construction of the school.

source: Okuzimba olutindo kwakugonza entambula y'ebyamaguzi mu disitulikiti.
reference: Construction of the bridge will ease the movement of goods in the district.

source: Olutindo lujja kugatta abantu ku byobusuubuzi okuva mu bitundu ebirala.
reference: The bridge will link people and trade activities from different areas.

source: Olutindo lujja kuyamba mu kutumbula ebyenfuna by'ekitundu.
reference: The bridge will also help in the economic development      of the area.

source: Wajja kubeerawo okutumbula eby'ensuubulagana mu mawanga agaliraanye.
reference: There will be improvement of trade in the neighboring countries.

source: Abakulembeze ba disitulikiti baabadde n'olukiiko ku kuzimba ebintu ebigasiza awamu abantu mu disitulikiti.
reference: The district leaders had a meeting about the construction of infrastructures in the district.

source: Gavumenti eyisizza okuzimbibwa kw'olutindo.
reference: The government has approved the construction of the bridge.

source: Kya bbeeyi nnyo okuddaabiriza ekidyeri ekyonoonese.
reference: It is very expensive to repair a broken down ferry.

source: Ekidyeri kirina obudde butono obw'okutambula.
reference: The ferry has limited time of movement.

source: Okuzimba olutindo kwawadde abantu abamu emirimu mu kitundu emirimu.
reference: The bridge construction offered job opportunities for some people in the community.

source: Abakulembeze bayaayaanira gavumenti okuyamba mu kuzimba kw'olutindo.
reference: The leaders are yearning for the government to help in the construction of the bridge.

source: Abakulembeze batema mpenda okuzuula engeri zonna ez'okukomya obwavu buli mu ngeri zonna.
reference: The leaders are making plans in finding ways to end poverty in all forms everywhere.

source: Waliwo abantu abaafiirwa obulamu bwabwe olw'entalo n'obukuubagano mu byobufuzi.
reference: There are people who lost their lives due to wars and political conflict.

source: Mbeebaza mwenna olw'okujja okujaguza ekisa kya Katonda ekyataasizza obulamu bwange.
reference: I thank you all for coming to celebrate  God's grace that saved my life.

source: Bulijjo tubaddenga mu ddembe n'obumu mu kitundu kyaffe.
reference: We have always lived in peace and harmony in our community.

source: Obutakkaanya mu batuuze bulina okugonjoolwa mu mirembe.
reference: Disputes should be settled peacefully among residents.

source: Yavunaanye muliraanwa we okumuloga.
reference: She accused her neighbor of bewitching her.

source: Omukulembeze w'oludda oluvuganya gavumenti yakwatiddwa mu ngeri embi.
